-- DaoEmployees_S2_Select -- 2014/2/9 日立 太郎 SELECT [EmployeeID], [LastName], [FirstName], [Title], [TitleOfCourtesy], [BirthDate], [HireDate], [Address], [City], [Region], [PostalCode], [Country], [HomePhone], [Extension], [Photo], [Notes], [ReportsTo], [PhotoPath] FROM [Employees]
WHERE [EmployeeID] = @EmployeeID
